projects.title: DisaVu
projects.description: Solution that uses machine learning to improve disaster response after hurricanes/tornadoes
achievements: First place in the AWS Disaster Response Hackathon
Machine learning models to predict building footprints and to predict whether buildings in those footprints are damaged
Solution was presented in RE:MARS by AWS

projects.title: CORTX Spark Integration
projects.description: Hadoop and Spark integration using Seagates CORTX S3 compatible API
achievements: Second place in the Seagate CORTX Integration Challenge
Built an ansible script to deploy Hadoop and Spark using CORTX as a backend object storage on top of HDFS

projects.title: Sensing the air quality in my room
projects.description: Used an Azure Sphere IOT device along with Azure IOT services to create a dashboard of CO2 and Dust levels in my room
achievements: Runner up in the Azure Sensing the World competition
Used Azure Direct methods to modify mutable state of the device from the cloud
Wrote my own libraries for the MHZ-19 and PMS-7003 devices

projects.title: Lock and Load
projects.description: Cloud enabled RFID lock using the Azure Sphere IOT device
achievements: One of several runners up in the Secure Everything with Azure Sphere Challenge
Built an IOT enabled lock that was capable of working on and off network
Allowed over the air addition of new RFID cards

projects.title: WACTF 2018 - Second Place
projects.description: WACTF is a weekend long challenge based cybersecurity competition (Capture the Flag) created and hosted by the Perth cybersecurity community.
achievements: Placed second amongst 60 teams competing that weekend
Learnt a lot during the weekend on defencive and offencive security

projects.title: NASA Spaceapps - Supergiant Scuti
achievements: One of four finalists for the Best Use of Hardware award
Used Unity to build an AR/VR data visualation solutions to be used in classrooms

projects.title: Monte Rocks
projects.description: Created a physics based monte carlo simulator to minimise rock bridges
achievements: Built a simulator which would take in blasting parameters generate rock sizes based on a cumulative distribution function based on that blasting pattern
The simulator would then simulate a truck full of rocks, see whether they blocked the schute and run this multiple times
The end output of the simulation was and optimisation on explosive cost to get a specific fragmentation distribution and that distributions chance of generating a rock bridge

projects.title: Steel Ballers
achievements: Built a digital twin of a grinding circuit
Used a genetic algorithm to provide recommendations to operators for settings that may optimise the grinder for a given set of inputs

projects.title: KLOG - IOT Safety Device
projects.description: Mesh networked IOT safety device using the B.A.T.M.A.N mesh networking protocol
achievements: First place in the BHP/Unearthed Digital Tribes Hackathon
Built an IOT device to improve safety in mine sites with limited telemetry by using mesh networking over 2.4GHz WiFi
